resources.string: Today\’s French artist is a group called Therapie Taxi, a group of young adults whose sing the fever of post-adolescent life. With their addictive unbridled lyrics, in French, mixed with rock and electro music. With the recent release of her debut album “Hit Sale”, what a descriptive title it is, the group is living a sweet moment. With an extensive tour ahead of themselves and a pretty good repercussion of their debut record, Therapie Taxi is building a promising career in France and part of Europe. (https://vibesofsilence.com/introducing-therapie-taxi/) )
